The label is read in parts: "***INGREDIENTS: CREAM CHEESE***, CANE SUGAR, PASTEURIZED CULTURED MILK & CREAM, EGGS, SOUR CREAM, PALM OIL, BUTTER OIL, COCOA, ENRICHED FLOUR (wheat flour***), CRYSTALLIZED LEMON***, LACTOSE, NON FAT MILK, WHOLE MILK POWDER, SALT, SUNFLOWER LECITHIN, VANILLA, WHEY POWDER, YELLOW COLOR***, CAROB BEAN GUM, GUAR GUM. CONTAINS:  Egg, Milk, Wheat***".
reason_for_recall: Undeclared Soy Lecithin.  Label declares Sunflower Lecithin instead of Soy Lecithin.
